Warehouse Keeper Parman: You must know that all dwarves such as I are union members. Dwarven society is extremely competitive by definition and their unions are even more so. You must not think that just because we are always smiling that being a union member is an easy life. In or out of the union, life for a Dwarf is a never-ending struggle for survival. (Quest for Dwarves of level 37 and above.)
